overview.en: DragonVein (DVC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. DragonVein has a current supply of 10,000,000,000 with 153,359,950 in circulation. The last known price of DragonVein is 0.23841984 USD and is down -4.07 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $6,390,858.13 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://www.dragonvein.io/.
